Name: JojaCola Generator
Description: Pierre is smart, so smart infact, he invented a machine which uses Joja Cola as a fuel source, by adding 10 cans, you too can make 1 battery, I bet Morris feels envious.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 燃烧煤炭将其能量转化为电池组，每次消耗5块煤炭。
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein Generator, der Batterien produziert, benötigt zum Betrieb 5 Kohle.
